home.benefit1: Style Meets Innovation: Our sunglasses blend cutting-edge designs with timeless aesthetics, making you stand out wherever you go.
home.benefit2: Ultimate Eye Protection: Engineered with 100% UV protection and polarized lenses, they safeguard your eyes while reducing glare for clear, comfortable vision.
home.benefit3: Eco-Friendly Materials: Made from sustainable materials, our sunglasses help protect the planet while protecting your eyes.
home.benefit4: Durability You Can Trust: Built to last, they resist scratches, impacts, and everyday wear, ensuring a reliable companion for all your adventures.

wishlistPage.title: Wishlist
wishlistPage.underTitle: All of your favorite styles in one place. Keep track of your items, create multiple lists, and share your favorites with friends and family.
wishlistPage.startWishlistP: Click the heart icon to create a wishlist
wishlistPage.startWishlistP2: Keep track of all the items you love. Click the heart icon on each product image to save your favorites in a wishlist.
wishlistPage.access: To access your wishlist, and see previously saved items, please sign into your account.
